mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND trunc(start_date) = trunc(sysdate) ORDER BY start_date DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND trunc(start_date) >= trunc(sysdate) - 7 ORDER BY start_date DESC

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND start_date > TRUNC(start_date) + INTERVAL '09:00' HOUR TO MINUTE THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS lateCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND end_date IS NULL AND TRUNC(start_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS absentCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND end_date IS NOT NULL AND end_date < TRUNC(start_date) + INTERVAL '18:00' HOUR TO MINUTE THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS earlyLeaveCount FROM attendance WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND start_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 7;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND trunc(start_date) >= trunc(sysdate, 'YYYY') AND trunc(start_date) < trunc(sysdate, 'YYYY') + interval '1' year ORDER BY start_date DESC

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND start_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') + INTERVAL '1' YEAR AND start_date > TRUNC(start_date) + INTERVAL '09:00' HOUR TO MINUTE THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS lateCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND start_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') + INTERVAL '1' YEAR AND end_date IS NULL AND TRUNC(start_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS absentCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND start_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') + INTERVAL '1' YEAR AND end_date IS NOT NULL AND end_date < TRUNC(start_date) + INTERVAL '18:00' HOUR TO MINUTE THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS earlyLeaveCount, COUNT(DISTINCT TRUNC(start_date)) AS statsDay, -- 근무일 수 계산 NVL(SUM( CASE WHEN end_date IS NOT NULL THEN (end_date - start_date) * 24 -- 총 근무 시간 계산 ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS statsHours FROM attendance WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND start_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') + INTERVAL '1' YEAR

SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND start_date >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{year} || '-' || #{month} || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM') AND start_date < ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{year} || '-' || #{month} || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM'), 1)

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND start_date > TRUNC(start_date) + INTERVAL '09:00' HOUR TO MINUTE THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS lateCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND end_date IS NULL AND TRUNC(start_date) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS absentCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND end_date IS NOT NULL AND end_date < TRUNC(start_date) + INTERVAL '18:00' HOUR TO MINUTE THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS earlyLeaveCount FROM attendance WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND start_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND start_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + INTERVAL '1 MONTH';

SELECT m.id AS member_id, m.name, t.team_name, a.start_date, a.end_date FROM members m LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.member_id = m.id AND a.start_date BETWEEN #{startOfWeek} AND #{endOfWeek} LEFT JOIN teams t ON m.team_code = t.team_code order by m.name
